dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Neguse (for himself, Mr. Wilson of South Carolina, and Mr. Ciscomani) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To modify and extend the authority of the Secretary of Defense to carry out a program to commemorate the 50th anniversary of the Vietnam War.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Vietnam Veteran Commemoration Fund Act of 2025.

section.header: Extension and modification of program to commemorate 50th anniversary of Vietnam War

subsection.text: Section 598 of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2008 (Public Law 110–181; 10 U.S.C. 113 note) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a), by striking may conduct and inserting shall conduct;
in subsection (c), by striking may and inserting shall;
in subsection (e)(1), by striking If the Secretary establishes and inserting For purposes of carrying out; and

subparagraph.text: by striking if established by the Secretary of Defense under subsection (a),; and
by inserting of Defense after Secretary.

subsection.text: The amendments made by subsection (a) shall take effect on November 11, 2025.
